thread.title: ‘I don’t want to be known as the heartbreak kid’
thread.title_full: ‘I don’t want to be known as the heartbreak kid’

title: ‘I don’t want to be known as the heartbreak kid’
text:
Email a friend 
BACHELORETTE Sam Frost says she’s disappointed how many times her heartbreak has been mentioned on the series, saying she doesn’t want to be known as the “heartbreak kid”. 
Frost is having a second public shot at love on the reality dating show, after her heart was sensationally broken by Bachelor Blake Garvey during a previous instalment of the series. 
Love rat Garvey had asked Frost to marry him, only to dump her for fellow contestant Louise Pillidge, who came third. 
This time around, Frost is star of the show with 14 Aussie lads in the fight to win her heart, but the 26-year-old beauty admits she is frustrated at how many times her heartbreak is mentioned on the series. 
“I did make a point. I said, ‘can you not keep bringing it up all the time’,” Frost told KIIS FM’s Hughesy & Kate. “I don’t want to be known as the heartbreak kid. 
“So I’m a bit disappointed watching it back about how many times it is brought up.” 
Frost’s comments come as three bachelors are left in the contest to win her heart: Michael, Richie and Sasha. 
She said she is looking forward to being open about her new boyfriend once the series winds up. “It’s pretty weird but I’m excited because it means I can get a coffee down the street and actually say my boyfriend’s name,” she said. Sam Frost and Michael during the home dates. Source: Channel 10
